SELECT * FROM( SELECT AA.*, CEIL(ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY ROWNUM)/#{pageSize, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) PAGENO, COUNT(BS_NUM) OVER() AS TOTALCOUNT FROM( SELECT ROWNUM , X.* FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT A.BS_NUM BS_NUM, A.HM_EMPNUM HM_EMPNUM, A.BS_TITLE BS_TITLE, A.BS_HITNUM BS_HITNUM, TO_DATE(A.BS_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BS_INSERTDATE, NVL((SELECT COUNT(B.BSR_NUM) FROM BOARD_SUREPLY B GROUP BY BS_NUM HAVING B.BS_NUM = A.BS_NUM ),0) AS BSR_NUM, NVL((SELECT COUNT(C.BSL_LIKEYN) FROM BOARD_SULIKE C GROUP BY BS_NUM HAVING C.BS_NUM = A.BS_NUM ),0) AS BSL_LIKEYN, NVL((SELECT COUNT(C.BSL_DISLIKEYN) FROM BOARD_SULIKE C GROUP BY BS_NUM HAVING C.BS_NUM = A.BS_NUM ),0) AS BSL_DISLIKEYN FROM BOARD_SUGGESTION A, BOARD_SUREPLY B, BOARD_SULIKE C WHERE BS_DELETEYN = 'Y'
AND A.bs_title LIKE '%'||#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND A.bs_content LIKE '%'||#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
AND A.hm_empnum LIKE '%'||#{keyword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}||'%'
ORDER BY BS_NUM DESC ) X )AA ) WHERE PAGENO = #{curPage, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT A.BS_NUM BS_NUM, A.HM_EMPNUM HM_EMPNUM, A.BS_TITLE BS_TITLE, A.BS_CONTENT BS_CONTENT, A.BS_IMAGE BS_IMAGE, A.BS_HITNUM BS_HITNUM, TO_DATE(A.BS_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BS_INSERTDATE FROM BOARD_SUGGESTION A WHERE A.BS_DELETEYN = 'Y' AND A.BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_SUGGESTION( BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BS_TITLE, BS_CONTENT, BS_IMAGE, BS_INSERTDATE, BS_UPDATEDATE, BS_DELETEYN )VALUES( #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_image, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD_SUGGESTION SET BS_DELETEYN = 'N' WHERE BS_DELETEYN = 'Y' AND BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM ,SR.* FROM ( SELECT A.BSR_NUM BSR_NUM, A.HM_EMPNUM HM_EMPNUM, A.BSR_CONTENT BSR_CONTENT, TO_DATE(A.BSR_INSERTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BSR_INSERTDATE FROM BOARD_SUREPLY A WHERE BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND BSR_DELETEYN = 'Y' ORDER BY BSR_NUM ) SR
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_SUREPLY( BSR_NUM, BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BSR_CONTENT, BSR_DELETEYN, BSR_INSERTDATE, BSR_UPDATEDATE )VALUES( #{bsr_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bsr_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y', TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') )
mapper.delete: DELETE BOARD_SUREPLY WHERE BSR_DELETEYN = 'Y' AND BSR_NUM = #{bsr_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND (HM_EMPNUM = #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} or 'H000000000000' = #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BSL_LIKEYN) BSL_LIKEYN FROM BOARD_SULIKE WHERE BSL_LIKEYN = 'Y' AND BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_SULIKE( BSL_NUM, BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BSL_LIKEYN )SELECT #{bsl_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BSL_NUM, BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BSL_LIKEYN, BSL_DISLIKEYN FROM BOARD_SULIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HM_EMPNUM = #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(BSL_DISLIKEYN) BSL_DISLIKEYN FROM BOARD_SULIKE WHERE BSL_DISLIKEYN = 'Y' AND BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_SULIKE( BSL_NUM, BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BSL_DISLIKEYN )SELECT #{bsl_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 'Y' FROM DUAL WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT BSL_NUM, BS_NUM, HM_EMPNUM, BSL_DISLIKEYN, BSL_LIKEYN FROM BOARD_SULIKE WHERE 1 = 1 AND BS_NUM = #{bs_num, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND HM_EMPNUM = #{hm_empnum, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
